RelatedListDefinition.name: RelatedListDefinition
RelatedListDefinition.description: Represents information about a related list. A related list specifies a set of records for a related object, based on specific criteria.

DefaultSort.description: The default sort string for the related list.

DurableId.description: The unique identifier for the related list. Always retrieve this value before using it, as the value can change from one release to the next. Simplify queries by using this field instead of making multiple queries.

EntityDefinitionId.description: The ID of the entity containing the related list.

IsCustomizable.description: Indicates whether columns on the related list can be customized (true) or not (false).

IsDescribable.description: Indicates whether the related list can appear in describeLayout call results (true) or not (false).

IsLayoutable.description: Indicates whether the related list can be assigned to a layout. (true) or not (false).

Label.description: The label for the related list.

ParentEntityDefinitionId.description: The ID of the ParentEntityDefinition thatâ€™s associated with the rows in the related list.

RelatedListId.description: The ID of the related list.

RelatedListName.description: The unique name of the related list in the API.
